about.summary: Module for the Hunspell spellchecker engine

commands: python -c "import hunspell; import os; env = os.environ['CONDA_PREFIX']; hobj = hunspell.HunSpell(f'{env}/share/hunspell_dictionaries/en_US.dic', f'{env}/share/hunspell_dictionaries/en_US.aff'); assert hobj.spell('spookie') == False, 'spookie'; assert hobj.spell('spooky') == True, 'spooky'"

about.summary: Module for the Hunspell spellchecker engine

commands: python -c "import hunspell; import os; env = os.environ['CONDA_PREFIX']; hobj = hunspell.HunSpell(f'{env}/share/hunspell_dictionaries/en_US.dic', f'{env}/share/hunspell_dictionaries/en_US.aff'); assert hobj.spell('spookie') == False, 'spookie'; assert hobj.spell('spooky') == True, 'spooky'"

name: pyhunspell
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pyhunspell" %}
{% set pypi_name = "hunspell" %}
{% set version = "0.5.5" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ pypi_name[0] }}/{{ pypi_name }}/hunspell-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0f830b68bd8c392f4d5b4e21c38e28809e14d64ec67bde48272c920b63686f53

build:
  skip: True  # [not linux64]
  number: 3

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - hunspell
  run:
    - python
    - hunspell

test:
  imports:
    - hunspell
  commands:
    - pip check
    - python -c "import hunspell; import os; env = os.environ['CONDA_PREFIX']; hobj = hunspell.HunSpell(f'{env}/share/hunspell_dictionaries/en_US.dic', f'{env}/share/hunspell_dictionaries/en_US.aff'); assert hobj.spell('spookie') == False, 'spookie'; assert hobj.spell('spooky') == True, 'spooky'"
  requires:
    - pip
    - hunspell-en

about:
  home: http://github.com/blatinier/pyhunspell
  summary: Module for the Hunspell spellchecker engine
  license:  GPL-3.0-only
  license_file: gpl-3.0.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - cgr71ii
